pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenCensus PyMySQL Integration============================================================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opencensus-ext-pymysql.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opencensus-ext-pymysql/Installation------------:: pip install opencensus-ext-pymysqlUsage-----.. code:: python from opencensus.trace import config_integration config_integration.trace_integrations(['pymysql'])References----------* `OpenCensus Project <https://opencensus.io/>`_
